column1: Local Foods////We stopped at Local Foods last weekend on our way to the Houston Zoo. My wife had the smoked salmon sandwich
column2: I have the crunchy chicken sandwich and the vegan chili (no meat chili available
column4: and my daughter had a kid's grilled cheese. Everything was delicious... especially that smoked salmon sandwich. Even the vegan chili was very good
column5: and I didn't really miss the meat.
